channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump reportedly seeks to extend ACA subsidies as affordability push finds common ground with Mamdani; Centene, Oscar shares jump
item.description: Centene which is a top participant in public health exchanges, jumped 8%, Molina Healthcare rallied 5%, and Oscar Health soared 24%.

item.title: A massive tech update will bring faster, cheaper trading to Wall Street. Get ready for stocks on a blockchain
item.description: Giants like JPMorgan Chase and BlackRock are embracing 'tokenization,' while upstarts like Robinhood and Kraken race ahead.

item.title: 73 million Americans will be driving and nearly 18 million will go through TSA in the busiest Thanksgiving travel season in 15 years
Pope Leo warns Gen Z and Gen Alpha that using AI too much could limit their potential: ‘Don’t ask it to do your homework’
item.description: As Gen Z turns to ChatGPT en masse, the pope is sounding the alarm about the erosion of critical thinking skills.

item.title: As boomers are forced back to work because they can’t afford to retire, Robinhood CEO says Gen Z are opening retirement accounts at just 19 years old
item.description: Robinhood cofounder and CEO Vlad Tenev says young people are embracing old-fashioned investments—and it seems to be working, as the young generation i...
